item.title: Hello world (of CI/CD)
item.description: CW21 Hack Day - 2021-03-31 to 2021-04-01 Amonette-1943 - HP1-CW21 Hack Day idea Proposer Sorrel Harriet This document should be used to capture the information for a Hack Day Idea. Idea name (provisional) This is the provisional name of the Idea, solution or just a title; this can be changed later if a team is formed and you decide on a new team/product name. Hello World! (of CI/CD) Context / Research Domain Please describe the context or research domain to which the problem applies
